name: SLIDER (itch) (Zachary Piccinelli)
description:
Epilepsy WarningThis game contains a background which constantly changes in exposure and saturation

In this short game, you must navigate a path along the screen using your mouse cursor, but be careful.

Information
  • Move with your mouse.
  • Get to the green to move on to the next level.
  • There are 11 levels
  • After level 6, left-click on the beat to turn the tile your cursor is on
